started.description: Front-End Developer located in Paraná/Brazil, currently studying software engineering, focused on software development and creating interfaces with pre-made animations ready for use. Skilled in designing, animating, and coding products. Always striving to create interfaces with fantastic experiences

skills.title: skill
skills.subtitle: and i can help with...
skills.frontEnd_description: Proficiency in turning concepts into reality, ensuring accessibility, functionality, and quality. They accurately implement the designed layout, ensuring a complete and satisfactory user experience.
skills.backend_description: With experience in creating and managing efficient servers and APIs, I possess a solid understanding of databases that complements my skills. Constantly seeking to optimize every aspect of the process, with an unwavering focus on quality and performance, I am ready to tackle challenges and contribute significantly to the success of any project.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: a little about myself
about.description: Front-End Developer based in Paraná, Brazil, my journey in programming began as a simple hobby at the age of 16. However, over time, this interest grew and turned into a genuine passion. Apart from the programming world, I enjoy music and books. I am an unrelenting curious person, always seeking new knowledge and ways to enhance my skills.
